qas.question: What are air arrivals required to have?

answers.text: required to have had a negative COVID-19 test

qas.question: From when must the test have been taken?

answers.text: within 72 hours before travelling to the island

paragraphs.context: Entry to St Helena, Ascension and Tristan da Cunha: All air arrivals (except from Ascension) to St Helena are required to have had a negative COVID-19 test within 72 hours before travelling to the island.

qas.question: What are the entry restrictions in place for foreign nationals?

answers.text: There are no other entry restrictions in force

paragraphs.context: There are no other entry restrictions in force and foreign nationals are permitted to enter St Helena provided they meet the immigration rules.

qas.question: Where does the travel corridor go from ?

paragraphs.context: There is currently a travel corridor between St Helena and Ascension.
